getState

public char getState()
Get the Process state (Running, Zombie, etc.).

Supported Platforms: All.

System equivalent commands:

  • AIX: top, ps
  • Darwin: top, ps
  • FreeBSD: top, ps
  • HPUX: top, ps
  • Linux: top, ps
  • Solaris: top, ps
  • Win32: taskman

Returns:
Process state (Running, Zombie, etc.)
